mapper.select: SELECT HQ_CODE, HQ_NAME, REGION_CODE, HQ_ABBR_NAME FROM TCS_HEADQUARTERS WHERE HQ_NAME = #{hqName}

SELECT A.REGION_NAME AS regionName, A.TCS_NAME AS tcsName, A.TRAFFIC_AMOUNT AS trafficAmount, A.SUM_TM AS sumTm, A.CAR_TYPE AS carType FROM TRAFFIC_VOLUME A INNER JOIN TCS_HEADQUARTERS B ON A.REGION_CODE = B.HQ_CODE WHERE A.REGION_CODE = #{RegionCode} ORDER BY CREATED_TIME, CAR_TYPE
